timeline.body: I like your fix, I had to do similar in the 'move sandbox to mul' PR https://github.com/unicode-org/cldr/pull/757
timeline.bodyText: I like your fix, I had to do similar in the 'move sandbox to mul' PR #757

timeline.body: in https://github.com/unicode-org/cldr/pull/757 I made sure to print out the `base` locale also, because that's actually the one that's missing (not `localeID`)
